mapper.update:
update flight
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
from_loc = #{fromLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_loc = #{toLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_terminal = #{startTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_terminal = #{endTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update flight set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_loc = #{fromLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_loc = #{toLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_terminal = #{startTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_terminal = #{endTerminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
